description_for_human: Attempt to index all inscriptions in the Bitcoin blockchain, including ASCII strings of length >= 20 and media like images. Includes inscription transaction IDs and has deterministic ordering. Previously called: "bitcoin-strings-with-txids".
description_for_model: Attempt to index all inscriptions in the Bitcoin blockchain, including ASCII strings of length >= 20 and media like images. Includes inscription transaction IDs and has deterministic ordering. Previously called: "bitcoin-strings-with-txids".
